description: Terbium is a simple programming language developed by GitHub users jay3332 and Cryptex-github. According to the language's GitHub page, it is "performant yet elegant and feature-packed." It includes features inspired by both Rust and TypeScript.
Developers save Terbium source code as TRB files. These files can be analyzed using terbium_analyzer, tokenized using terbium_grammar, and interpreted and evaluated using terbium_interpreter.
